::Perndabot::

Perndabot had seen the reaction that his missile launcher had gotten 
from Biomass, deciding that these new bots were definitely not 
hostile. He looks down at Nue'e as she comes up to him and peeks 
around him at the IF. There wern't too many femms in the Alliance, 
and Perndabot wasn't too used to having femms near him, but he forced 
his attention to remain on Biomass, watching the bot for any 
suspicious activity.

"You can join, yeah," he says, keeping one eye on Nue'e, "Why don't 
all three of you follow me to Zardus? He's our commander."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Biomass almost has a sparkattack when Perndabot raised the 
missile 
> launcher to his chest, snaking his tenticles back to cover it so 
that it at 
> least had a little protection if they decided to shot.
> Nue'e looked, eyes wide at Perndabot, her own spark in her throat 
and 
> standing stark still.  There beings were hostile, and they were 
supposed to 
> mingle with them? This was going to harder then they thought.
> But both Biomass and Nue'e relax as Perndabot removes the launched 
from it's 
> location at Biomass's chest, sighing in relief.
> Biomass blinked as he listened to Perndabot introduce himself. His 
gaze 
> shifted to the Iron Fist when he gestured to it.
> This was the place they were going to stay? How.....wonderful.
> Nue'e took a few steps forward and looked even closer at the Iron 
Fist, her 
> view blocked by Perndabot so she moved up and peeked around his 
body to see 
> the base.
> It wasn't as nice looking as their ship but she was sure that they 
had a 
> perfect lab.
> Biomass kept his eyes on Perndabot until he noticed Swift, looking 
down at 
> her and waving a tenticle at her.*
> 
> " Hello."
> 
> * But then Biomass looked back towards Perndabot.*
> 
> " Our ship just crashed here and you were the closest faction to 
us. I 
> decided to join you, if I can."
> 
> " Me too." *came the voice from Nue'e as she looked straight up at 
Perndabot 
> before stepping around him and looking at the Iron Fist.*
> 
>
